text: Gordon James Mydland (May 12, 1922 - October 6, 2022) was an American former politician and attorney. He was the Attorney General of South Dakota between 1969 until 1973. Before, he was a member of the South Dakota Senate between 1963 until 1968.Gordon J. Mydland South Dakota Legislator Historical Listing He turned 100 in May 2022, and died on October 6, 2022, in Brookings, South Dakota. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Lawyers from South Dakota Category:Politicians from South Dakota Category:American judges
title: Gordon Mydland
